chart.title: First MD5 & Destination Sighting With OTX Tag

search.query: sourcetype=ziften:zenith:alert feed="otx" |eval basename = replace(imagefilepath, ".*\\\\", "")|timechart count by basename

sourcetype=ziften:zenith:alert feed="otx"|stats first(imagefilepath) as "Sample Path" dc(agentguid) as "Unique MD5 Prev With Associated OTX Tag" count as "Gross MD5 Count With Associated OTX Tag" min(_time) as "First Seen" max(_time) as "Last Seen" by imagefilemd5|lookup image_info imagefilemd5|sort -"Unique MD5 Prev With Associated OTX Tag" |convert ctime("First Seen") ctime("Last Seen")| fields imagefilemd5 "Sample Path" companyname fileversion productversion "Unique MD5 Prev With Associated OTX Tag" "Gross MD5 Count With Associated OTX Tag" "First Seen" "Last Seen"

sourcetype=ziften:zenith:alert feed="otx" |where imagefilemd5="$md5$" |makemv delim="," details |stats dc(ipaddress) as "Unique Tagged Destinations" values(details) as "System Tags" values(accountname) as "Seen User Associations" by agentguid |lookup system_info agentguid |sort -"Unique Tagged Destinations"|fields computername agentguid "Unique Tagged Destinations" "System Tags" "Seen User Associations"

sourcetype=ziften:zenith:alert feed="otx" |where imagefilemd5="$md5$" AND agentguid="$guid$" |makemv delim="," details |stats values(details) as "System Tags" count as "Gross Seen Connections" by ipaddress |sort -"Gross Seen Connections"
